contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1142-2019 to designate 28-30 Langley Avenue (Toronto Danforth, Ward 14) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: Bylaw 1142-2019 - To designate the property at 28-30 Langley Avenue as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 28-30 Langley Avenue, City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing – 28-30 Langley Avenue
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
